author: K. Bharat Kumar
title: Why has India reacted to declining global crude prices by raising excise duties?
description: Why has India reacted to declining global crude prices by raising excise duties?
content: The story so far: Till U.S. President Donald Trumps tweet the past week, on his conversation with Saudi Arabias Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, Brent crude prices had been declining in an unprecedented manner, touching an 18-year low. Mr. Trumps assurance t… [+4781 chars]
